DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess if a combination of everolimus, steroids, and mycophenolate mofetil is associated with a better renal function than sirolimus.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of the Switch From Sirolimus to Everolimus in Stable Maintenance Renal Transplant Patients Receiving a Calcineurin Inhibitor Free Regimen
DOC.criteria: First or second renal transplantation (1 to 10 years posttransplant) Treatment with sirolimus + mycophenolate mofetil + steroids + ACE inhibitor or angiotensin II receptor antagonist + statin Exclusion Criteria Treatment with a CNI or azathioprine Vascular rejection or biopsyproven acute rejection within 3 months prior to screening Severe dyslipidemia Other protocoldefined inclusion / exclusion criteria may apply
DOC.keyword: Renal transplantation, maintenance, switch, everolimus, CNI-free
